results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} x^k*(1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k)^4.
comment: Inverse Möbius transform of square pyramidal numbers (A000330).
mathematica: nmax = 47; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Sum[x^k (1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k)^4, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]]
Table[(DivisorSigma[1, n] + 3 DivisorSigma[2, n] + 2 DivisorSigma[3, n])/6, {n, 47}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 24 2018
